title: SpongyMoth
text:
[1] “#Sampling dates generated 2023-06-09”


Starting local Java server...


Closing connections and removing sockets...


Done.



library(DT)
final_dt <- DT::datatable(data = tablefinal,
                          colnames = c("resource", "site", "min66",
                                       "max66", "min95", "max95",
                                       "min99", "max99", "latitude",
                                       "longitude", "name"),
                          filter = "top",
                          extensions = c("Buttons", "ColReorder"),
                           options = list(
                       # list 10 entries at once
                       pageLength = 10, 
                       # automatically size columns
                       autoWidth = TRUE,
                       # highlight entries that match search term
                       searchHighlight = TRUE,
                       # allow regular expressions and case insensitive searches
                       search = list(regex = TRUE, caseInsensitive = TRUE),
                       dom = "Bfrtip",
                       # buttons options
                       buttons = c("copy", "csv", "excel", "pdf", "print", "colvis"),
                       # links to extension call
                       colReorder = TRUE)
)
final_dt
